data.name: Lieutenant Karsabi
data.caption: Brash Noble
data.ability: After you gain a disarm token, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to remove 1 disarm token.

data.name: Major Vynder
data.caption: Pragmatic Survivor
data.ability: While you defend, if you are disarmed, roll 1 additional defense die.

data.name: Nu Squadron Pilot
data.text: With a design inspired by other Cygnus Spaceworks vessels, the Alpha-class star wing is a versatile craft assigned to Imperial Navy specialist units that need a starfighter they can outfit for multiple roles.

data.name: Rho Squadron Pilot
data.text: The elite pilots of Rho Squadron instill terror in the Rebellion, using both the Xg-1 assault configuration and Os-1 arsenal loadout of the Alpha-class star wing to devastating effect.

data.name: Captain Kagi
data.caption: The Emperor's Shuttle Pilot
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 or more friendly ships at range 0-3. If you do, transfer all enemy lock tokens from the chosen ships to you.

data.name: Colonel Jendon
data.caption: Darth Vader's Shuttle Pilot
data.ability: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, while friendly ships acquire lock this round, they must acquire locks beyond range 3 instead of at range 0-3.

data.name: Lieutenant Sai
data.caption: Death Squadron Veteran
data.ability: After you a perform a [Coordinate] action, if the ship you chose performed an action on your action bar, you may perform that action.

data.name: Omicron Group Pilot
data.text: Noted for its tri-wing design and advanced sensor suite, the Lambda-class shuttle serves a critical role as a light utility craft in the Imperial Navy.

data.name: Baron of the Empire
data.text: Sienar Fleet System's TIE Advanced v1 is a groundbreaking starfighter design, featuring upgraded engines, a missile launcher, and folding s-foils.

data.name: Grand Inquisitor
data.caption: Master of the Inquisitorious
data.ability: While you defend at attack range 1, you may spend 1 [Force] to prevent the range 1 bonus. While you perform an attack against a defender at attack range 2-3, you may spend 1 [Force] to apply the range 1 bonus.

data.name: Inquisitor
data.text: The fearsome Inquisitors are given a great deal of autonomy and access to the Empire's latest technology, like the prototype TIE Advanced v1.

data.name: Seventh Sister
data.caption: Sadistic Interrogator
data.ability: While you perform a primary attack, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 2 [Force] to cancel 1 [Evade] result.

data.name: Darth Vader
data.caption: Black Leader
data.ability: After you perform an action, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform an action.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

data.name: Maarek Stele
data.caption: Servant of the Empire
data.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender would be dealt a faceup damage card, instead draw 3 damage cards, choose 1, and discard the rest.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

data.name: Storm Squadron Ace
data.text: The TIE Advanced x1 was produced in limited quantities, but Sienar engineers incorporated many of its best qualities into their next TIE model: the TIE Interceptor.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

data.name: Tempest Squadron Pilot
data.text: The TIE Advanced improved on the popular TIE/ln design by adding shielding, better weapons systems, curved solar panels, and a hyperdrive.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

data.name: Ved Foslo
data.caption: Ambitious Engineer
data.ability: While you execute a maneuver, you may execute a maneuver of the same bearing and difficulty of a speed 1 higher or lower instead.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

data.name: Zertik Strom
data.caption: Pitiless Administrator
data.ability: During the End Phase, you may spend a lock you have on an enemy ship to expose 1 of that ship's damage cards.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

data.name: "Double Edge"
data.caption: Contingency Planner
data.ability: After you perform a [Turret] or [Missile] attack that misses, you may perform a bonus attack using a different weapon.

data.name: Lieutenant Kestal
data.caption: Innate Deadeye
data.ability: While you perform an attack, after the defender rolls defense dice, you may spend 1 focus token to cancel all of the defender's blank/[Focus] results.

data.name: Onyx Squadron Scout
data.text: Designed for extended engagements, the TIE/ag is flown primarily by elite pilots trained to leverage both its unique weapons loadout and its maneuverability to full effect.

data.name: Sienar Specialist
data.text: During the development of the TIE aggressor, Sienar Fleet Systems valued performance and versatility over raw cost efficiency.

data.name: "Deathrain"
data.caption: Dexterous Bombardier
data.ability: After you drop or launch a device, you may perform an action.

data.name: "Redline"
data.caption: Adrenaline Junkie
data.ability: You can maintain up to 2 locks. After you perform an action, you may acquire a lock.

data.name: Cutlass Squadron Pilot
data.text: The TIE punisher's design builds upon the success of the TIE bomber, adding shielding, a second bomb chute, and three additional ordnance pods, each equipped with a twin ion engine.

data.name: Colonel Vessery
data.caption: Contemplative Commander
data.ability: While you perform an attack against a locked ship, after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a lock on the defender.

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

data.name: Countess Ryad
data.caption: Cutthroat Politico
data.ability: While you would execute a [Straight] maneuver, you may increase the difficulty of the maneuver. If you do, execute it as a [Koiogran Turn] maneuver instead.

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

data.name: Delta Squadron Pilot
data.text: In addition to its missile launchers and six wingtip laser cannons, the formidable TIE defender is equipped with deflector shields and a hyperdrive.

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

data.name: Onyx Squadron Ace
data.text: The experimental TIE defender outclasses all other contemporary starfighters, though its size, speed, and array of weapons come at a tremendous cost in credits.

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

data.name: Rexler Brath
data.caption: Onyx Leader
data.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, if you are evading, expose 1 of the defender's damage cards.

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

data.name: Alpha Squadron Pilot
data.text: Sienar Fleet Systems designed the TIE interceptor with four wing-mounted laser cannons, a dramatic increase in firepower over its predecessors.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

data.name: Saber Squadron Ace
data.text: Led by Baron Soontir Fel, the pilots of Saber Squadron are among the Empire's best. Their TIE interceptors are marked with red stripes to designate pilots with at least ten confirmed kills.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

data.name: Soontir Fel
data.caption: Ace of Legend
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc], gain 1 focus token.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

data.name: Turr Phennir
data.caption: Ambitious Ace
data.ability: After you perform an attack, you may perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, even if you are stressed.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

data.name: "Howlrunner"
data.caption: Obsidian Leader
data.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs a primary attack, that ship may reroll 1 attack die.

data.name: "Mauler" Mithel
data.caption: Black Two
data.ability: While you perform an attack at attack range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

data.name: "Night Beast"
data.caption: Obsidian Two
data.ability: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, you may perform a [Focus] action.

data.name: "Scourge" Skutu
data.caption: Seasoned Veteran
data.ability: While you perform an attack against a defender in your [Bullseye Arc], roll 1 additional attack die.

data.name: "Wampa"
data.caption: Black Eleven
data.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] to roll 1 additional attack die. After defending, lose 1 [Charge].

data.name: Academy Pilot
data.text: The Galactic Empire uses the fast and agile TIE/ln, developed by Sienar Fleet Systems and produced in staggering quantity, as its primary starfighter.

data.name: Black Squadron Ace
data.text: The elite TIE/ln pilots of Black Squadron accompanied Darth Vader on a devastating strike against the Rebel forces at the Battle of Yavin.

data.name: Del Meeko
data.caption: Inferno Three
data.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends against a damaged attacker, the defender may reroll 1 defense die.

data.name: Gideon Hask
data.caption: Inferno Two
data.ability: While you perform an attack against a damaged defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

data.name: Iden Versio
data.caption: Inferno Leader
data.ability: Before a friendly TIE/ln fighter at range 0-1 would suffer 1 or more damage, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, prevent that damage.

data.name: Obsidian Squadron Pilot
data.text: The TIE fighter's Twin Ion Engine system was designed for speed, making the TIE/ln one of the most maneuverable starships ever mass-produced.

data.name: Seyn Marana
data.caption: Inferno Four
data.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Critical Hit] result. If you do, deal 1 facedown damage card to the defender, then cancel you remaining results.

data.name: Valen Rudor
data.caption: Braggadocious Baron
data.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 defends (after damage is resolved, if any), you may perform an action.

data.name: "Echo"
data.caption: Slippery Trickster
data.ability: While you decloak, you must use the [2 [Bank Left]] or [2 [Bank Right]] template instead of the [2 [Straight]] template.

shipAbility.name: Stygium Array
shipAbility.text: After you decloak, you may perform an [Evade] action. At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 evade token to gain 1 cloak token.

data.name: "Whisper"
data.caption: Soft-Spoken Slayer
data.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, gain 1 evade token.

shipAbility.name: Stygium Array
shipAbility.text: After you decloak, you may perform an [Evade] action. At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 evade token to gain 1 cloak token.

data.name: Imdaar Test Pilot
data.text: The primary result of a hidden research facility on Imdaar Alpha, the TIE phantom achieves what many thought was impossible: a small starfighter equipped with an advanced cloaking device.

shipAbility.name: Stygium Array
shipAbility.text: After you decloak, you may perform an [Evade] action. At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 evade token to gain 1 cloak token.

data.name: Sigma Squadron Ace
data.text: Featuring a hyperdrive and shields, the TIE phantom is also equipped with five laser cannons, giving it substantial firepower for an Imperial fighter.

shipAbility.name: Stygium Array
shipAbility.text: After you decloak, you may perform an [Evade] action. At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 evade token to gain 1 cloak token.

data.name: "Vizier"
data.caption: Ruthless Tactician
data.ability: After you fully execute a speed 1 maneuver using your Adaptive Ailerons ship ability, you may perform a [Coordinate] action. If you do, skip your Perform Action step.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

data.name: Captain Feroph
data.caption: Imperial Courier
data.ability: While you defend, if the attacker does not have any green tokens, you may change 1 of your [Focus]/blank results to an [Evade] result.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

data.name: Major Vermeil
data.caption: Veteran of Scarif
data.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender does not have any green tokens, you may change 1 of your [Focus]/blank results to a [Hit] result.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

data.name: Scarif Base Pilot
data.text: The TIE reaper was designed to ferry elite troops to flashpoints on the battlefield, notably carrying Director Krennic's dreaded death troopers at the Battle of Scarif.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

data.name: "Deathfire"
data.caption: Unflinching Diehard
data.ability: After you are destroyed, before you are removed, you may perform an attack and drop or launch 1 device.

shipAbility.name: Nimble Bomber
shipAbility.text: If you would drop a device using a [Straight] template, you may use a [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template of the same speed instead.

data.name: Captain Jonus
data.caption: Disciplined Instructor
data.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, that ship may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

shipAbility.name: Nimble Bomber
shipAbility.text: If you would drop a device using a [Straight] template, you may use a [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template of the same speed instead.

data.name: Gamma Squadron Ace
data.text: Though it sacrifices a degree of speed and maneuverability compared to a TIE/ln, the TIE bomber's increased payload can carry enough firepower to destroy virtually any enemy target.

shipAbility.name: Nimble Bomber
shipAbility.text: If you would drop a device using a [Straight] template, you may use a [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template of the same speed instead.

data.name: Major Rhymer
data.caption: Scimitar Leader
data.ability: While you perform a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, you may increase or decrease the range requirement by 1, to a limit of 0-3.

shipAbility.name: Nimble Bomber
shipAbility.text: If you would drop a device using a [Straight] template, you may use a [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template of the same speed instead.

data.name: Scimitar Squadron Pilot
data.text: The TIE/sa is exceptionally nimble for a bomber, allowing it to pinpoint its target while avoiding excessive collateral damage to the surrounding area.

shipAbility.name: Nimble Bomber
shipAbility.text: If you would drop a device using a [Straight] template, you may use a [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template of the same speed instead.

data.name: Tomax Bren
data.caption: Brash Maverick
data.ability: After you perform a [Reload] action, you may revocer 1 [Charge] token on 1 of your equipped [Talent] upgrade cards.

shipAbility.name: Nimble Bomber
shipAbility.text: If you would drop a device using a [Straight] template, you may use a [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template of the same speed instead.

data.name: "Countdown"
data.caption: Death Defier
data.ability: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, if you are not stressed, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage and gain 1 stress token. If you do, cancel all dice results.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white (1 [Bank Left]), (1 [Straight]), or (1 [Bank Right]) maneuver.

data.name: "Duchess"
data.caption: Urbane Ace
data.ability: You may choose not to use your Adaptive Ailerons. You may use your Adaptive Ailerons even while stressed.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white (1 [Bank Left]), (1 [Straight]), or (1 [Bank Right]) maneuver.

data.name: "Pure Sabacc"
data.caption: Confident Gambler
data.ability: While you perform an attack, if you have 1 or fewer damage cards, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

data.name: Black Squadron Scout
data.text: These heavily armed atmospheric craft employ their specialized moveable wings to gain additional speed and maneuverability.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

data.name: Planetary Sentinel
data.text: To protect its many military installations, the Empire requires a swift and vigilant defense force.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

data.name: Captain Oicunn
data.caption: Inspired Tactician
data.ability: You can perform primary attacks at range 0.

data.name: Patrol Leader
data.text: To be granted command of a VT-49 Decimator is seen as a significant promotion for a middling officer of the Imperial Navy.

data.name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
data.caption: Advisor to Admiral Piett
data.ability: While you perform an attack, if you are reinforced and the defender is in the [Full Front Arc] or [Full Rear Arc] matching your reinforce token, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Critical Hit] result.

data.name: Blade Squadron Veteran
data.text: A unique gyrostabilization system surrounds the B-wing's cockpit, ensuring that the pilot always remains stationary during flight.

data.name: Blue Squadron Pilot
data.text: Due to its heavy weapons array and resilient shielding, the B-wing has solidified itself as the Rebel Alliance's most innovative assault fighter.

data.name: Braylen Stramm
data.caption: Blade Leader
data.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may reroll up to 2 of your dice.

data.name: Ten Numb
data.caption: Blue Five
data.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 stress token to change all of your [Focus] results to [Evade] or [Hit] results.

data.name: Garven Dreis
data.caption: Red Leader
data.ability: After you spend a focus token, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship gains 1 focus token.

data.name: Ibtisam
data.caption: Survivor of Endor
data.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you are stressed, you may roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, remove 1 stress token.

data.name: Norra Wexley
data.caption: Gold Nine
data.ability: While you defend, if there is an enemy ship at range 0-1, you may add 1 [Evade] result to your dice results.

data.name: Shara Bey
data.caption: Green Four
data.ability: While you defend or perform a primary attack, you may spend 1 lock you have on the enemy ship to add 1 [Focus] result to your dice results.

data.name: "Zeb" Orrelios
data.caption: Spectre-4
data.ability: While you defend, [Critical Hit] results are neutralized before [Hit] results.

shipAbility.name: Locked and Loaded
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, after your carrier ship performs a primary [Front Arc] or [Turret] attack, it may perform a bonus primary [Rear Arc] attack.

data.name: Ezra Bridger
data.caption: Spectre-6
data.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may spend 1 [Force] to change up to 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade] or [Hit] results.

shipAbility.name: Locked and Loaded
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, after your carrier ship performs a primary [Front Arc] or [Turret] attack, it may perform a bonus primary [Rear Arc] attack.

data.name: Hera Syndulla
data.caption: Spectre-2
data.ability: After you reveal a red or blue maneuver, you may set your dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty.

shipAbility.name: Locked and Loaded
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, after your carrier ship performs a primary [Front Arc] or [Turret] attack, it may perform a bonus primary [Rear Arc] attack.

data.name: Sabine Wren
data.caption: Spectre-5
data.ability: Before you activate, you may perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action.

shipAbility.name: Locked and Loaded
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, after your carrier ship performs a primary [Front Arc] or [Turret] attack, it may perform a bonus primary [Rear Arc] attack.

data.name: Kashyyyk Defender
data.text: Equipped with three wide-range Sureggi twin laser cannons, the Auzituck gunship acts as a powerful deterrent to slaver operations in the Kashyyyk system.

data.name: Lowhhrick
data.caption: Escaped Gladiator
data.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 becomes the defender, you may spend 1 reinforce token. If you do, that ship gains 1 evade token.

data.name: Wullffwarro
data.caption: Wookiee Chief
data.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are damaged, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

data.name: "Dutch" Vander
data.caption: Gold Leader
data.ability: After you perform the [Lock] action, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship may acquire a lock on the object you locked, ignoring range restrictions.

data.name: Evaan Verlaine
data.caption: Gold Three
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 focus token to choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, that ship rolls 1 additional defense die while defending until the end of the round.

data.name: Gold Squadron Veteran
data.text: Commanded by Jon "Dutch" Vander, Gold Squadron played an instrumental role in the Battles of Scarif and Yavin.

data.name: Gray Squadron Bomber
data.text: Long after the Y-wing was phased out by the Galactic Empire, its durability, dependability, and heavy armament help it remain a staple in the Rebel fleet.

data.name: Horton Salm
data.caption: Gray Leader
data.ability: While you perform an attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each other friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender.

data.name: Norra Wexley
data.caption: Gold Nine
data.ability: While you defend, if there is an enemy ship at range 0-1, add 1 [Evade] result to your dice results.

data.name: Esege Tuketu
data.caption: Selfless Hero
data.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends or performs an attack, it may spend your focus tokens as if that ship has them.

data.name: Miranda Doni
data.caption: Heavy Hitter
data.ability: While you perform a primary attack, you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die or, if you are not shielded, you may roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.

data.name: Warden Squadron Pilot
data.text: Koensayr Manufacturing's K-wing boasts an advanced SubLight Acceleration Motor and an unprecedented 18 hard points, granting it unrivaled speed and firepower.

data.name: Corran Horn
data.caption: Tenacious Investigator
data.ability: At initiative 0, you may perform a bonus primary attack against an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc]. If you do, at the start of the next Planning Phase, gain 1 disarm token.

shipAbility.name: Experimental Scanners
shipAbility.text: You can acquire locks beyond range 3. You cannot acquire locks at range 1.

data.name: Gavin Darklighter
data.caption: Bold Wingman
data.ability: While a friendly ship performs an attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], the attacker may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

shipAbility.name: Experimental Scanners
shipAbility.text: You can acquire locks beyond range 3. You cannot acquire locks at range 1.

data.name: Knave Squadron Escort
data.text: Designed to combine the best features of the X-wing series with the A-wing series, the E-wing boasts superior firepower, speed, and maneuverability.

shipAbility.name: Experimental Scanners
shipAbility.text: You can acquire locks beyond range 3. You cannot acquire locks at range 1.

data.name: Rogue Squadron Escort
data.text: The elite pilots of Rogue Squadron are among the Rebellion's very best.

shipAbility.name: Experimental Scanners
shipAbility.text: You can acquire locks beyond range 3. You cannot acquire locks at range 1.

data.name: Jan Ors
data.caption: Espionage Expert
data.ability: While a friendly ship in your firing arc performs a primary attack, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship may roll 1 additional attack die.

data.name: Kyle Katarn
data.caption: Relentless Operative
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens to a friendly ship in your firing arc.

data.name: Rebel Scout
data.text: Designed to look like a bird in flight by the Corellian Engineering Corporation, "hawk" series ships are exemplary transport craft. Swift and rugged, the HWK-290 is often employed by Rebel agents as a mobile base of operations.

data.name: Roark Garnet
data.caption: Good-Hearted Smuggler
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc. If you do, it engages at initiative 7 instead of its standard initiative value this phase.

data.name: Chewbacca
data.caption: The Mighty
data.ability: Before you would be dealt a faceup damage card, you may spend 1 [Charge] to be dealt the card facedown instead.

data.name: Han Solo
data.caption: Scoundrel for Hire
data.ability: After you roll dice, if you are at range 0-1 of an obstacle, you may reroll all of your dice. This does not count as rerolling for the purpose of other effects.

data.name: Lando Calrissian
data.caption: General of the Alliance
data.ability: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-3. That ship may perform an action.

data.name: Outer Rim Smuggler
data.text: Known for its durability and modular design, the YT-1300 is one of the most popular, widely used, and extensively customized freighters in the galaxy.

data.name: Arvel Crynyd
data.caption: Green Leader
data.ability: You can perform primary attacks at range 0. If you would fail a [Boost] action by overlapping another ship, resolve it as though you were partially executing a maneuver instead.

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

data.name: Green Squadron Pilot
data.text: Due to its sensitive controls and high maneuverability, only the most talented pilots belong in an A-wing cockpit.

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

data.name: Jake Farrell
data.caption: Sage Instructor
data.ability: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. That ship may perform a [Focus] action.

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

data.name: Phoenix Squadron Pilot
data.text: Led by Commander Jun Sato, the brave but inexperienced pilots of Phoenix Squadron face staggering odds in their battle against the Galactic Empire.

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

data.name: "Zeb" Orrelios
data.caption: Spectre-4
data.ability: While you defend, [Critical Hit] results are neutralized before [Hit] results.

shipAbility.name: Comms Shuttle
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, your carrier ship gains [Coordinate]. Before your carrier ship activates, it may perform a [Coordinate] action.

data.name: AP-5
data.caption: Escaped Analyst Droid
data.ability: While you coordinate, if you chose a ship with exactly 1 stress token, it can perform actions.

shipAbility.name: Comms Shuttle
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, your carrier ship gains [Coordinate]. Before your carrier ship activates, it may perform a [Coordinate] action.

data.name: Ezra Bridger
data.caption: Spectre-6
data.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may spend 1 [Force] to change up to 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade]/[Hit] results.

shipAbility.name: Comms Shuttle
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, your carrier ship gains [Coordinate]. Before your carrier ship activates, it may perform a [Coordinate] action.

data.name: Fenn Rau
data.caption: Reluctant Rebel
data.ability: After an enemy ship in your firing arc engages, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship cannot spend tokens to modify dice while it performs an attack during this phase.

shipAbility.name: Comms Shuttle
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, your carrier ship gains [Coordinate]. Before your carrier ship activates, it may perform a [Coordinate] action.

data.name: Biggs Darklighter
data.caption: Red Three
data.ability: While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] damage to cancel 1 matching result.

data.name: Blue Squadron Escort
data.text: Designed by Incom Corporation, the T-65 X-wing quickly proved to be one of the most effective and versatile military vehicles in the galaxy and a boon to the Rebellion.

data.name: Cavern Angels Zealot
data.text: Unlike most Rebel cells, Saw Gerrera's partisans are willing to use extreme methods to undermine the Galactic Empire's objectives in brutal battles that raged from Geonosis to Jedha.

data.name: Edrio Two Tubes
data.caption: Cavern Angels Veteran
data.ability: Before you activate, if you are focused, you may perform an action.

data.name: Garven Dreis
data.caption: Red Leader
data.ability: After you spend a focus token, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship gains 1 focus token.

data.name: Jek Porkins
data.caption: Red Six
data.ability: After you receive a stress token, you may roll 1 attack die to remove it. On a [Hit] result, suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

data.name: Kullbee Sperado
data.caption: Enigmatic Gunslinger
data.ability: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, you may flip your equipped [Configuration] upgrade card.

data.name: Leevan Tenza
data.caption: Rebel Alliance Defector
data.ability: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, you may perform a red [Evade] action.

data.name: Luke Skywalker
data.caption: Red Five
data.ability: After you become the defender (before dice are rolled), you may recover 1 [Force].

data.name: Red Squadron Veteran
data.text: Created as an elite starfighter squad, Red Squadron includes some of the best pilots in the Rebel Alliance.

data.name: Thane Kyrell
data.caption: Corona Four
data.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Focus], [Hit], or [Critical Hit] result to look at the defender's facedown damage cards, choose 1, and expose it.

data.name: Wedge Antilles
data.caption: Red Two
data.ability: While you perform an attack, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

data.name: "Zeb" Orrelios
data.caption: Spectre-4
data.ability: While you defend, [Critical Hit] results are neutralized before [Hit] results.

data.name: Captain Rex
data.caption: Clone Wars Veteran
data.ability: After you perform an attack, assign the Suppressive Fire condition to the defender.

data.name: Ezra Bridger
data.caption: Spectre-6
data.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may spend 1 [Force] to change up to 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade] or [Hit] results.

data.name: Sabine Wren
data.caption: Spectre-5
data.ability: Before you activate, you may perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action.

data.name: Benthic Two Tubes
data.caption: Cavern Angels Marksman
data.ability: After you perform a [Focus] action, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens to a friendly ship at range 1-2.

data.name: Blue Squadron Scout
data.text: Used for deploying troops under the cover of darkness or into the heat of battle, the UT-60D U-wing fulfills the Rebellion's need for a swift and hardy troop transport.

data.name: Bodhi Rook
data.caption: Imperial Defector
data.ability: Friendly ships can acquire locks onto objects at range 0-3 of any friendly ship.

data.name: Cassian Andor
data.caption: Raised by the Rebellion
data.ability: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. If you do, that ship removes 1 stress token.

data.name: Heff Tobber
data.caption: Blue Eight
data.ability: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, if it is at range 0, you may perform an action.

data.name: Magva Yarro
data.caption: Cavern Angels Spotter
data.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends, the attacker cannot reroll more than 1 attack die.

data.name: Partisan Renegade
data.text: Saw Gerrera's partisans were first established to oppose Separatist forces on Onderon during the Clone Wars and continued to wage war against galactic tyranny as the Empire rose to power.

data.name: Saw Gerrera
data.caption: Obsessive Radical
data.ability: While a damaged friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack, it may reroll 1 attack die.

data.name: "Chopper"
data.caption: Spectre-3
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, each enemy ship at range 0 gains 2 jam tokens.

shipAbility.name: Tail Gun
shipAbility.text: While you have a docked ship, you have a primary [Rear Arc] weapon with an attack value equal to your docked ship's primary [Front Arc] value.

data.name: Hera Syndulla
data.caption: Spectre-2
data.ability: After you reveal a red or blue maneuver, you may set your dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty.

shipAbility.name: Tail Gun
shipAbility.text: While you have a docked ship, you have a primary [Rear Arc] weapon with an attack value equal to your docked ship's primary [Front Arc] value.

data.name: Kanan Jarrus
data.caption: Spectre-1
data.ability: While a friendly ship in your firing arc defends, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 fewer attack die.

shipAbility.name: Tail Gun
shipAbility.text: While you have a docked ship, you have a primary [Rear Arc] weapon with an attack value equal to your docked ship's primary [Front Arc] value.

data.name: Lothal Rebel
data.text: Another successful Corellian Engineering Corporation freighter design, the VCX-100 is larger than the ubiquitous YT-series, boasting more living space and customizability.

shipAbility.name: Tail Gun
shipAbility.text: While you have a docked ship, you have a primary [Rear Arc] weapon with an attack value equal to your docked ship's primary [Front Arc] value.

data.name: "Leebo"
data.caption: Dry-Witted Droid
data.ability: After you defend or perform an attack, if you spent a calculate token, gain 1 calculate token.

shipAbility.name: Sensor Blindspot
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack at attack range 0-1, do not apply the range 0-1 bonus and roll 1 fewer attack die.

data.name: Dash Rendar
data.caption: Hotshot Mercenary
data.ability: While you move, you ignore obstacles.

shipAbility.name: Sensor Blindspot
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack at attack range 0-1, do not apply the range 0-1 bonus and roll 1 fewer attack die.

data.name: Wild Space Fringer
data.text: Although stock YT-2400 light freighters have plenty of room for cargo, that space is often annexed to support modified weapon systems and oversized engines.

shipAbility.name: Sensor Blindspot
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack at attack range 0-1, do not apply the range 0-1 bonus and roll 1 fewer attack die.

data.name: Airen Cracken
data.caption: Intelligence Chief
data.ability: After you perform an attack, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. That ship may perform an action, treating it as red.

data.name: Bandit Squadron Pilot
data.text: The Z-95 Headhunter was the primary inspiration for Incom Corporation's exemplary T-65 X-wing starfighter. Though it is considered outdated by modern standards, it remains a versatile and potent snub fighter.

data.name: Lieutenant Blount
data.caption: Team Player
data.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if there is at least 1 other friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

data.name: Tala Squadron Pilot
data.text: The AF4 series is the latest in a long line of Headhunter designs. Cheap and relatively durable, it is a favorite among independent outfits like the Rebellion.

data.name: IG-88A
data.caption: Aggressive Automaton
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship with [Calculate] on its action bar at range 1-3. If you do, transfer 1 of your calculate tokens to it.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Droid Brain
shipAbility.text: After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

data.name: IG-88B
data.caption: Brutal Battledroid
data.ability: After you perform an attack that misses, you may perform a bonus [Cannon] attack.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Droid Brain
shipAbility.text: After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

data.name: IG-88C
data.caption: Conniving Contraption
data.ability: After you perform a [Boost] action, you may perform an [Evade] action.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Droid Brain
shipAbility.text: After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

data.name: IG-88D
data.caption: Deadly Device
data.ability: While you execute a Segnor's Loop ([Segnor's Loop Left] or [Segnor's Loop Right]) maneuver, you may use another template of the same speed instead: either the turn ([Turn Left] or [Turn Right]) of the same direction or the straight ([Straight]) template.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Droid Brain
shipAbility.text: After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

data.name: Crymorah Goon
data.text: Though far from nimble, the Y-wing's heavy hull, substantial shielding, and turret-mounted cannons make it an excellent patrol craft.

data.name: Drea Renthal
data.caption: Pirate Lord
data.ability: While a friendly non-limited ship performs an attack, if the defender is in your firing arc, the attacker may reroll 1 attack die.

data.name: Hired Gun
data.text: Just the mention of Imperial credits can bring a host of less-than-trustworthy individuals to your side.

data.name: Kavil
data.caption: Callous Corsair
data.ability: While you perform a non-[Front Arc] attack, roll 1 additional attack die.

data.name: Freighter Captain
data.text: Many spacers make a living traveling the Outer Rim, where the difference between smuggler and legitimate merchant is often murky. On the outskirts of civilization, buyers are rarely so discerning to ask where merchandise came from, at least as long as the price is low enough.

data.name: Han Solo
data.caption: The Corellian Kid
data.ability: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the attack is obstructed by an obstacle, you may roll 1 additional die.

data.name: L3-37
data.caption: Droid Revolutionary
data.ability: If you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank ([Bank Left] and [Bank Right]) maneuvers.

data.name: Lando Calrissian
data.caption: Smooth-talking Gambler
data.ability: After you roll dice, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to reroll all of your blank results.

data.name: Autopilot Drone
data.caption: Set to Blow
data.text: Sometimes, manufacturer's warnings are made to be broken.

shipAbility.name: Rigged Energy Cells
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, if you are not docked, lose 1 [Charge]. At the end of the Activation Phase, if you have 0 [Charge], you are destroyed. Before you are removed, each ship at range 0-1 suffers 1 [Critical Hit] damage.

data.name: L3-37
data.caption: Droid Revolutionary
data.ability: If you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank ([Bank Left] and [Bank Right]) maneuvers.

shipAbility.name: Co-Pilot
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, your carrier ship has your pilot ability in addition to its own.

data.name: Lando Calrissian
data.caption: Smooth-talking Gambler
data.ability: After you roll dice, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to reroll all of your blank results.

shipAbility.name: Co-Pilot
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, your carrier ship has your pilot ability in addition to its own.

data.name: Outer Rim Pioneer
data.caption: Skillful Outlaw
data.ability: Friendly ships at range 0-1 can perform attacks at range 0 of obstacles.

shipAbility.name: Co-Pilot
shipAbility.text: While you are docked, your carrier ship has your pilot ability in addition to its own.

data.name: Fenn Rau
data.caption: Skull Leader
data.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if the attack range is 1, you may roll 1 additional die.

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

data.name: Joy Rekkoff
data.caption: Skull Squadron Ace
data.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] from an equipped [Torpedo] upgrade. If you do, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

data.name: Kad Solus
data.caption: Skilled Commando
data.ability: After you fully execute a red maneuver, gain 2 focus tokens.

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

data.name: Old Teroch
data.caption: Mandalorian Mentor
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 1. If you do and you are in its [Front Arc], it removes all of its green tokens.

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

data.name: Skull Squadron Pilot
data.text: The aces of Skull Squadron favor an aggressive approach, using their craft's pivot wing technology to achieve unmatched agility in the pursuit of their quarry.

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

data.name: Zealous Recruit
data.text: Mandalorian Fang Fighter pilots must master the Concordia Faceoff maneuver, leveraging their ships' narrow attack profile to execute deadly head-on charges.

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

data.name: Boba Fett
data.caption: Notorious Bounty Hunter
data.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy ship at range 0-1.

data.name: Bounty Hunter
data.text: The Firespray-class patrol craft is infamous for its association with the deadly bounty hunters Jango Fett and Boba Fett, who packed their craft with countless deadly armaments.

data.name: Emon Azzameen
data.caption: Shipping Magnate
data.ability: If you would drop a device using a [1 [Straight]] template, you may use the [3 [Turn Left]], [3 [Straight]], or [3 [Turn Right]] template instead.

data.name: Kath Scarlet
data.caption: Captain of the Binayre Pirates
data.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if there is at least 1 friendly non-limited ship at range 0 of the defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

data.name: Koshka Frost
data.caption: Icy Professional
data.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if the enemy ship is stressed, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

data.name: Krassis Trelix
data.caption: Imperial Deserter
data.ability: You can perform [Front Arc] special attacks from your [Rear Arc]. While you perform a special attack, you may reroll 1 attack die.

data.name: 4-LOM
data.caption: Reprogrammed Protocol Droid
data.ability: After you fully execute a red maneuver, gain 1 calculate token. At the start of the End Phase, you may choose 1 ship at range 0-1. If you do, transfer 1 of your stress tokens to that ship.

data.name: Gand Findsman
data.text: The legendary Findsmen of Gand worship the enshrouding mists of their home planet, using signs, augurs, and mystical rituals to track their quarry.

data.name: Zuckuss
data.caption: Meditative Gand
data.ability: While you perform a primary attack, you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

data.name: Dace Bonearm
data.caption: Outer Rim Mercenary
data.ability: After an enemy ship at range 0-3 receives at least 1 ion token, you may spend 3 [Charge]. If you do, that ship gains 2 additional ion tokens.

data.name: Palob Godalhi
data.caption: Tethan Resister
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your firing arc at range 0-2. If you do, transfer 1 focus or evade token from that ship to yourself.

data.name: Spice Runner
data.text: Though its cargo space is limited compared to other light freighters, the small, swift HWK-290 is a favorite choice of smugglers who specialize in discreetly transporting precious goods.

data.name: Torkil Mux
data.caption: Mercenary Miner
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc. If you do, that ship engages at initiative 0 instead of its normal initiative value this round.

data.name: Contracted Scout
data.text: Built for long-distance reconnaissance and plotting new hyperspace routes, the lightly armed JumpMaster 5000 is often extensively retrofitted with custom upgrades.

data.name: Dengar
data.caption: Vengeful Corellian
data.ability: After you defend, if the attcker is in your [Front Arc], you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a bonus attack against the attacker.

data.name: Manaroo
data.caption: Graceful Aruzan
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, transfer all green tokens assigned to you to that ship.

data.name: Tel Trevura
data.caption: Escape Artist
data.ability: If you would be destroyed, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, discard all of your damage cards, suffer 5 [Hit] damage, and place yourself in reserves instead. At the start of the next Planning Phase, place yourself within range 1 of your player edge.

data.name: Black Sun Ace
data.text: The Kihraxz assault fighter was developed specifically for the Black Sun crime syndicate, whose highly paid ace pilots demanded a nimble, powerful ship to match their skills.

data.name: Captain Jostero
data.caption: Aggressive Opportunist
data.ability: After an enemy ship suffers damage, if it is not defending, you may perform a bonus attack against that ship.

data.name: Cartel Marauder
data.text: The versatile Kihraxz was modeled after Incom's popular X-wing starfighter, but an array of aftermarket modification kits ensure a wide variety of designs.

data.name: Graz
data.caption: The Hunter
data.ability: While you defend, if you are behind the attacker, roll 1 additional defense die. While you perform an attack, if you are behind the defender roll 1 additional attack die.

data.name: Talonbane Cobra
data.caption: Scourge of Tansarii Point
data.ability: While you defend at attack range 3 or perform an attack at range 1, roll 1 additional die.

data.name: Viktor Hel
data.caption: Storied Bounty Hunter
data.ability: After you defend, if you did not roll exactly 2 defense dice, the attack gains 1 stress token.

data.name: Asajj Ventress
data.caption: Force of Her Own
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your [Single Turret Arc] at range 0-2 and spend 1 [Force] token. If you do, that ship gains 1 stress token unless it removes 1 green token.

data.name: Ketsu Onyo
data.caption: Black Sun Contractor
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in both your [Front Arc] and [Single Turret Arc] at range 0-1. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.

data.name: Sabine Wren
data.caption: Artistic Saboteur
data.ability: While you defend, if the attacker is in your [Single Turret Arc] at range 0-2, you may add 1 [Focus] result to your dice results.

data.name: Shadowport Hunter
data.text: Crime syndicates augment the lethal skills of their loyal contractors with the best technology available, like the fast and formidable Lancer-class pursuit craft.

data.name: Cartel Executioner
data.text: Many veteran pilots in the service of the Hutt kajidics and other criminal operations choose the M12-L Kimogila for its firepower and dreaded reputation alike.

shipAbility.name: Dead to Rights
shipAbility.text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.

data.name: Dalan Oberos
data.caption: Returned from the Grave
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 shielded ship in your [Bullseye Arc] and spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, that ship loses 1 shield and you recover 1 shield.

shipAbility.name: Dead to Rights
shipAbility.text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.

data.name: Torani Kulda
data.caption: Rodian Freelancer
data.ability: After you perform an attack, each enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] suffers 1 [Hit] damage unless it removes 1 green token.

shipAbility.name: Dead to Rights
shipAbility.text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.

data.name: Cartel Spacer
data.text: MandalMotors' M3-A 'Scyk' Inteceptor is purchased in large quantities by the Hutt Cartel and the Car'das smugglers due to its low cost and customizability.

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

data.name: Genesis Red
data.caption: Tansarii Point Crime Lord
data.ability: After you acquire a lock, you must remove all of your focus and evade tokens. Then gain the same number of focus and evade tokens that the locked ship has.

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

data.name: Inaldra
data.caption: Tansarii Point Boss

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

data.name: Laetin A'shera

data.ability: After you defend or perform an attack, if the attack missed, gain 1 evade token.

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

data.name: Quinn Jast

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

data.name: Serissu
data.caption: Flight Instructor

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

data.name: Sunny Bounder

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

data.name: Tansarii Point Veteran
data.text: The defeat of Black Sun ace Talonbane Cobra by Car'das smugglers turned the tide of the Battle of Tansarii Point Station. Survivors of the clash are respected throughout the sector.

shipAbility.name: Weapon Hardpoint
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Cannon], [Torpedo], or [Missile] upgrade.

data.caption: Noisy Nuisance
data.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, before attack dice are rolled, if you are not in the enemy ship's [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, the enemy ship gains 1 jam token.

shipAbility.name: Notched Stabilizers
shipAbility.text: While you move, you ignore asteroids.

data.name: Mining Guild Surveyor
data.text: With Imperial construction projects consuming raw materials at an unprecedented rate, the Mining Guild ruthlessly expolits newly discovered deposits... ore on worlds such as Batonn, Lothal...

shipAbility.name: Notched Stabilizers
shipAbility.text: While you move, you ignore asteroids.

data.name: Overseer Yushyn
data.ability: Before a friendly ship at range 1 would gain a disarm token, if that ship is not stressed, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, that ship gains 1 stress token in...

shipAbility.name: Notched Stabilizers

data.name: Constable Zuvio
data.caption: Missing Sheriff of Nima Outpost
data.ability: If you would drop a device, you may launch it using a [1 [Straight]] template instead.

shipAbility.name: Spacetug Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: Action: Choose a ship in your [Front Arc] at range 1. That ship gains 1 tractor token, or 2 tractor tokens if it is in you [Bullseye Arc] at range 1.

data.name: Jakku Gunrunner
data.text: The Quadrijet transfer spacetug, commonly called a "Quadjumper" is nimble in space and atmosphere alike, making it popular among both smugglers and explorers.

shipAbility.name: Spacetug Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: Action: Choose a ship in your [Front Arc] at range 1. That ship gains 1 tractor token, or 2 tractor tokens if it is in you [Bullseye Arc] at range 1.

data.name: Sarco Plank
data.caption: The Scavenger
data.ability: While you defend, you may treat your agility value as equal to the speed of the maneuver you executed this round.

shipAbility.name: Spacetug Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: Action: Choose a ship in your [Front Arc] at range 1. That ship gains 1 tractor token, or 2 tractor tokens if it is in you [Bullseye Arc] at range 1.

data.name: Unkar Plutt
data.caption: Miserly Portion Master
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there are one or more other ships at range 0, you and each other ship at range 0 gain 1 tractor token.

shipAbility.name: Spacetug Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: Action: Choose a ship in your [Front Arc] at range 1. That ship gains 1 tractor token, or 2 tractor tokens if it is in you [Bullseye Arc] at range 1.

data.name: Captain Nym
data.caption: Captain of the Lok Revenants
data.ability: Before a friendly bomb or mine would detonate, you may spend 1 [Charge] to prevent it from detonating. While you defend against an attack obstructed by a bomb or mine, roll 1 additional defense die.

data.name: Lok Revenant
data.text: The Nubian Design Collective crafted the Scurrg H-6 Bomber with combat versatility in mind, arming it with powerful shields and a bristling array of destructive weaponry.

data.name: Sol Sixxa
data.caption: Cunning Commander
data.ability: If you would drop a device using a [1 [Straight]] template, you may drop it using any other speed 1 template instead.

data.name: Black Sun Assassin
data.text: Although assassinations can be handled with a shot in the dark or a dire substance added to a drink, a flaming shuttle tumbling from the sky sends a special kind of message.

shipAbility.name: Microthrusters
shipAbility.text: While you perform a barrel roll, you must use the [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template instead of the [Straight] template.

data.name: Black Sun Enforcer
data.text: Prince Xizor himself collaborated with MandalMotors to design the StarViper-class attack platform, one of the most formidable starfighters in the galaxy.

shipAbility.name: Microthrusters
shipAbility.text: While you perform a barrel roll, you must use the [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template instead of the [Straight] template.

data.name: Dalan Oberos
data.caption: Elite Bounty Hunter
data.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 stress token to rotate your ship 90˚.

shipAbility.name: Microthrusters
shipAbility.text: While you perform a barrel roll, you must use the [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template instead of the [Straight] template.

data.name: Guri
data.caption: Prince Xizor's Bodyguard
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is at least 1 enemy ship at range 0-1, you may gain 1 focus token.

shipAbility.name: Microthrusters
shipAbility.text: While you perform a barrel roll, you must use the [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template instead of the [Straight] template.

data.name: Prince Xizor
data.caption: Black Sun Kingpin
data.ability: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, another friendly ship at range 0-1 and in the attack arc may suffer 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] damage. If it does, cancel 1 matching result.

shipAbility.name: Microthrusters
shipAbility.text: While you perform a barrel roll, you must use the [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template instead of the [Straight] template.

data.name: Bossk
data.caption: Fearsome Hunter
data.ability: While you perform a primary attack, after the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1 [Critical Hit] result to add 2 [Hit] results.

data.name: Latts Razzi
data.caption: Martial Artist
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a ship at range 1 and spend a lock you have on that ship. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.

data.name: Moralo Eval
data.caption: Criminal Mastermind
data.ability: If you would flee, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, place yourself in reserves instead. At the start of the next Planning Phase, place yourself within range 1 of the edge of the play area that you fled from.

data.name: Trandoshan Slaver
data.caption: Fearsome Hunter
data.text: The spacious triple-decker design of the YV-666 makes it popular among bounty hunters and slavers, who often retrofit an entire deck for prisoner transport.

data.name: Binayre Pirate
data.text: Operating from the Double Worlds, Talus and Tralus, Kath Scarlet's gang of smugglers and pirates would never be described as reputable or dependable - even by other criminals.

data.name: Black Sun Soldier
data.text: The vast and influential Black Sun crime syndicate can always find a use for talented pilots, provided they aren't particular about how they earn their credits.

data.name: Kaa'to Leeachos
data.caption: Imposing Marauder
data.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0-2. If you do, transfer 1 focus or evade token from that ship to yourself.

data.name: N'dru Suhlak
data.caption: Hunt Saboteur
data.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

data.name: Nashtah Pup
data.caption: Contingency Plan
data.ability: You can deploy only via emergency deployment, and you have the name, initiative, pilot ability, and ship [Charge] of the friendly, destroyed Hound's Tooth.

shipAbility.name: Escape Craft
shipAbility.text: Setup: Requires the Hound's Tooth. You must begin the game docked with the Hound's Tooth.
